articles.title: Load-shedding is crushing mobile Internet in South Africa - MyBroadband
articles.description: A MyBroadband analysis has revealed that South Africa’s mobile networks struggle to maintain performance during continued load-shedding.
articles.content:
Load-shedding directly impacts mobile network infrastructure, and, as a result, mobile Internet speeds tend to suffer.
A MyBroadband analysis showed that Vodacom and Telkom customers saw the most si… [+4119 chars]

articles.title: Rand eyes R18.00 to the dollar as load shedding and rate uncertainty bite - BusinessTech
articles.description: The South African rand has come under immense pressure on Monday (19 September) as the country feels the pressure of stage 6 load shedding, and markets look ahead to interest rate hikes from major central banks.
